body.name: Digital Camera 4K UHD Vlogging Camera, 44MP Autofocus Compact Camera with 16X Digital Zoom, Rechargeable Point and Shoot Digital Camera with 32GB SD Card, 2 Batteries for Teens Kids Boys Girls
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 56 mins
Or fastest pickup Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 56 mins
features: 【UHD 4K Video & 44MP Photo】 This children's camera boasts of 4K video resolution and 44MP image resolution, significantly enhancing image clarity and helping to capture the most exciting memorable moments in high-quality images or videos. Whether capturing your child's first bicycle ride or a family picnic in the park, the 4K digital camera's auto-focus function ensures every shot is crystal clear.

【16X Digital Zoom & Flash Light】 The kid's digital camera features a 2.4-inch IPS screen and a 16X digital zoom. Whether capturing the details of a butterfly's wings in your backyard or a school performance from the back row, the W/T button allows you to zoom in or out effortlessly. The point and shoot camera also includes a built-in flash, adjustable with a simple press of a button, enabling clear photos even in low-light conditions such as twilight camping trips or indoor birthday parties.

【Vlogging Camera as Webcam】 This digital camera doubles as a webcam by connecting it to the PC with a USB cable. It's perfect for kids wanting to chat with friends on Skype, or beginners wanting to start live streaming on Tiktok, YouTube, Facebook, or other social media platforms. The USB 2.0 cable ensures the camcorder stays charged during long video calls or while recording extended videos, making it a versatile tool for virtual family gatherings or online classes.

【Multi-function Camera】This portable multifunctional digital camera supports multiple functions such as self-timer, face detection, continuous shooting, time-lapse recording and slow-motion recording. Whether capturing the beauty of blooming flowers or documenting your child's soccer game, this camera enhances the shooting experience. It also comes with a built-in microphone and speaker for crystal-clear sound when shooting video, perfect for vlogging or family vacation clips

【Perfect Gift for Kids】 This mini digital camera comes with two rechargeable lithium batteries and an auto-shutdown feature in 1/3/5 minutes for power conservation. Whether it's for a school trip or a weekend at grandma's, the included storage bag and lanyard offer added protection and prevent loss. The camera is an ideal gift for birthdays, holidays, or as a special reward, sparking joy and creativity in every child's heart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good camera for the price!
reviews.reviewText: This camera is a gem for the price. It small, compact and light weight. It take good pictures for an inexpensive camera and good videos too. Comes with everything you need. Two batteries, memory card, strap, and a bag to store it in. You can also put it on a tripod if you need to. Great for beginners.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Capturing Memories in Crisp Detail
reviews.reviewText: This Digital Camera exceeded all expectations! The 44MP autofocus lens and 16X digital zoom deliver stunning clarity, making every shot picture-perfect. It's a user-friendly marvel, perfect for teens and kids. The added convenience of a 32GB SD card and extra batteries ensures uninterrupted shooting. A fantastic gift that combines quality, ease of use, and ample storage – highly recommended for budding photographers! 📸✨

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This camera is perfect for my daughter. The price it right. The pictures come out well. It was easy to set up and start taking pictures. Quality is good. Comes with 2 batteries and a storage card. Great product for the value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars clear pictures and lightweight camera
reviews.reviewText: took several pictures in sun light and results were very good, clearly pictures were high resolution and colors were true to real. Two batteries are really handy.Good for casual photography and experiment in outside. Good gift to kids who don't have mobile phone yet. They like point and shoot cameras. Flash light is not very strong but does the job. It's important to learn AF feature to get best results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile Digital camera
reviews.reviewText: The camera is pretty light weight unlike what I expected and is easy to carry around as compared with my phone which is heavy. It came with two batteries which charged quickly as well as memory card for 32GB which is good. The picture quality itself was good for the price of the camera and was even better when transferred to a PC. Doesn’t make too many noises when using it. Overall good quality and simple to use. Good gift option as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Camera for Beginners or as a Spare
reviews.reviewText: I got this camera to add to my travel kit which includes 2 sports/action compact camera, a drone and now this camera. I primarily use the sports/action cameras to record my adventures when traveling but figured I would add something for the more calm, less adventurous moments and this camera is a nice fit to that role. I do wish it had ports for external microphone, display or ring light. But for the price, the camera is still good. And it comes with 2 batteries as well as the SD card which I consider a huge bonus! I wouldn't say this camera is for professionals but it adds nicely to my travel kit!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased it as a gift for my daughter, and she is absolutely delighted. She carries it with her wherever she goes. The photo quality is good. It comes with two batteries, which is a great bonus. Considering the price, it is an excellent camera. Previously, we had a children's camera, and the photo quality was significantly inferior.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All in one package
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this for my 7 year old who has been asking for a digital camera. It was so handy that everything came in the package, including a generously sized SD card and 2 batteries. It's easy for him to use, and take with him on the go. You can always have a battery charged and ready to go, and they are easy to swap out. We will be taking this on our next vacation for sure!!
